li.a: KC International Academy Local Wellness Policy

b.u: KCIA WILL BE CLOSED FOR THE REMAINDER OF THE ACADEMIC YEAR

div.p:
We Miss Our Students
Elementary School Video | Middle School Video

Electronic Device Pick-Up
KCIA parents/students can pick up a device for their child at KCIA between the hours of 10:30am-1:30pm on Tuesdays and Fridays. Each child will be loaned a device during distance learning that will be returned to KCIA once distance learning ends.

Technology Loan Agreement
English Version | Somali Version | Arabic Version | Vietnamese Version | Spanish Version | Swahili Version

KCIA Meal Services Plan
English Version | Somali Version | Arabic Version | Vietnamese Version | Spanish Version

br.span:
Middle school students need to check their email daily and log into their Google Classroom accounts to find assignments and lessons for each class. If there are any questions, please email the teacher.
Teacher office hours are 9:00-11:00am and 1:00-2:30pm.
Elementary students should click on their grade level and follow the lesson plan for each day. If there are any questions, please email the teacher.

div.p: Transitional Kindergarten lessons: Google Doc | PDF // Kindergarten lessons: Google Doc | PDF // First grade lessons: Google Doc | PDF
Second grade lessons // Sheltered 2-3 lessons // Third grade lessons
Fourth grade lessons // Sheltered 4-5 lessons // Fifth grade lessons

a.u: Connect with KCIA teachers & students on Facebook

div.p: Kansas City International Academy is committed to excellence in education, inspiring and empowering children from all nationalities and diverse backgrounds, giving them the foundation they need to achieve the highest level of success in life.
